title: Unexpected Termination
description: YouTube channel '@KarelTest' terminated for 'Spam, deceptive practices and scams'. No specific reason or video cited.

title: First Appeal Submitted
description: Initial appeal submitted via web form, expressing confusion and requesting clarification.

title: Appeal Denied
description: YouTube confirms termination after review, again without providing specific details.

title: Public Escalation (X/Twitter)
description: Reached out to @TeamYouTube on X, suggesting a potential brand violation and offering to rename the channel.

title: Formal Letter to Google Ireland
description: Sent a formal written letter to Google Ireland HQ in Dublin regarding the lack of transparency.

title: Third Detailed Appeal
description: Submitted a highly detailed appeal with forensic analysis of possible causes.

title: Final Appeal Denial
description: Standard denial email received. No context or reason provided despite detailed explanation.

title: ODS Case Opened
description: Case initiated via Out-of-Court Dispute Settlement (ODS) mechanism.

title: Letter of Concern to Alphabet/Google
description: Updated Letter of Concern sent to Alphabet/Google legal department.
